document.full_text: on monday morning, the shuttle endeavour rose slowly on a pillar of fire, picking up speed and eventually disappearing from view as it stabbed through a layer of clouds on its way to orbit.
document.title: endeavour's final flight
lines_and_colors: on monday morning, the shuttle endeavour rose slowly on a pillar of fire, picking up speed and eventually disappearing from view as it stabbed through a layer of clouds on its way to orbit.
